divs: Sighting DetailsWalked to the back of my truck in the drive way. It was about 9:30pm on 8-12-12. I was just looking up and I saw a small spec of light moving south. I thought it was a satellite and thought how will I know it's you and not a satellite? Just then it shot down so fast I was going to run then I was going to fall to the ground. Then it stopped, moved in circles then shot back up and vanished into the darkness. So, I feel like they were letting me see that, they saw me.
Summary: Small dot, stayed small as it decended at me.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around August 12th 2012
